nodes.text: The Great Migration was an annual, month-long mass migration of bird species on the Chiss Ascendancy planet of Shihon. During their wandering year, the young Chiss Yoponek and Yomie visited the planet to see the migration, bringing their Agbui companions Haplif, Shimkif, and others along.

Shimkif poisoned many local birds to divert the Great Migration, hoping to expedite the time that Yomie would be willing to leave the planet. While Shimkif's poisoning of the birds led to the cancellation of the Great Migration, Yomie insisted on staying on Shihon and watching a lesser migration in Shihon's Panopyl Mountains.
